string.name: set_debug_server_host_tip
string.value:
使用如下命令设置调试服务地址：
hdc shell 
cem publish --event 'com.extscreen.runtime.ACTION_CHANGE_DEBUG_SERVER' --data '192.168.xx.xx'  （电脑端调试服务地址）

string.name: reason_location
string.value: Used for navigation, map positioning, and nearby service functions.

string.name: reason_camera
string.value: Used for taking photos, recording videos, and video call functions.

string.name: reason_microphone
string.value: Used for voice input, audio/video calls, and recording functions.

string.name: reason_contacts
string.value: Used for contact selection, display, and related communication features.

string.name: reason_storage
string.value: Used for reading and saving local data such as images and files.

string.name: reason_calendar
string.value: Used to display schedules, set reminders, and sync calendar information.

string.name: reason_health
string.value: Used to record and analyze health data, such as steps and heart rate.

string.name: reason_bluetooth
string.value: Used to connect and manage Bluetooth devices, such as headsets and wearables.

string.name: reason_activity_movement
string.value: Used to record activities like walking and running for health analysis services.

string.name: reason_notifications
string.value: Used to receive notifications to ensure timely access to important information.

string.name: reason_background_audio
string.value: The app needs to keep running in the background to continue audio playback.
